verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Bringing in the sheaves bringing in the sheaves, newline We shall come rejoicing bringining in the sheaves. newline Bringing in the sheaves bringing in the sheaves, newline We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sowing in the morning sowing seeds of kindness, newline Sowing in the noontide and the dewy eve. newline Waiting for the harvest and the time of reaping, newline We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Sowing in the sunshine sowing in the shadows, newline Fearing neither clouds nor winter's chilling breeze, newline By and by the harvest and the labour ended, newline We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Go then even weeping sowing for the Master. newline Though the loss sustained our Spirit often grieves. newline When our weepings over He will bid us welcome, newline We shall come rejoicing bringing in the sheaves.
